item.title: Emmanouil Papadeas
item.description: I am a co-founder and lead developer of Orama Interactive, an indie game (and software, apparently) development team. I love science and learning, games, art, animals, dreams, chocolate, automation, robots, life, the Universe. I do not love coffee, coffee is overrated. We’re currently just a group of friends who dream of one day making Orama an actual company, and create content for a living.
